title: Riot finally caters to Social Justice on a thread that is obviously satire.
body:
This is why we can't have fun anymore on boards?
This is why Memes + games are coming down?
This is why we can't use our expression to settle our differences?
I thought that thread was good and funny. Oh wait I said too much I am a baaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaad person.

(Note: I was referring to this: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/wXcW0acP-its-unbelievable-riot-just-announced-an-enormous-change-to-soloq )

{{champion:163}}
